cab.content: e C re copy no.WAR CABINET. Meeting of Ministers and parliamentary secretaries held in the Prime Minister's Room,House of Commons, on FRIDAY, 23RD FEBRUARY, 1945at 12 Noon.present:The Rt. Hon. Winston S.' Churchill. M.P.,Prime Minister. (In the Chair)The Rt. Hon. Anthony Eden, M.P.,Secretary of State for ForeignAffairs.The Rt. Hon. Viscount Simon,Lord Chancellor.The Rt. Hon. L. S. Amery, M.P.,Secretary of State for India and secretary of State for Burma.The Rt. Hon. Sir Andrew Duncan, M.P.,Minister of Supply.The Rt. Hon. R.A. Butler, M.P.,Minister of Education.The Rt. Hon.
